articles.title: Queen Elizabeth II's Jaguar X-Type which she drove through the Windsor Estate sells for £43,000 - Daily Mail
articles.description: A car beloved by Her late Majesty, and thought to be her second favourite vehicle to drive, has gone under the hammer at an auction house in Berkshire.
articles.content:
A Jaguar X-Type that belonged to the late Queen Elizabeth II has been sold for £43,000 after it went under the hammer at auction.
